question: What is his background?
answer: With Mastère Spécialisé "Réseaux & Services", Option Sécurité from Télécom SudParis, Jol Amouzou has of experience as a Ingénieur sécurité at Expert Line in, of experience as a Consultant Réseaux Sécurité at Alliance Automotive Group France in Levallois-Perret, Île-de-France, France, of experience as a Ingénieur Réseaux chez SUEZ Environnement at GFI Group in SUEZ, La Défense, of experience as a Ingénieur Support Systèmes & Réseaux at SFR Business Distribution in Courbevoie, of experience as a Ingénieur Réseaux - OBS at Gfi Informatique in Bagnolet, of experience as a Consultant Exploitation des plates-formes de Services Orange at ALTEN in Ivry-sur-Seine, of experience as a Consultant Supervision at Devoteam in Levallois-Perret, of experience as a Consultant Supervision Système - SFR at Devoteam in Région de Saint-Denis, France, of experience as a Consultant Supervision Réseaux - SNCF at Devoteam in Levallois, of experience as a Work Placement at Devoteam Digital Impulse in DEVOTEAM Consulting, of experience as a Professeur de Technologie at Ministère de l'Éducation nationale, de la Jeunesse et des Sports in Seine-et-Marne, of experience as a Ingénieur Support N2 WAN/MAN at SNCF in Paris 17ème, of experience as a Administrateur VOIP at Free - Groupe iliad in 75008 Paris, of experience as a Conseiller Multimédia at Free - Groupe iliad in 75008 PARIS, of experience as a Stage de fin d'études at Orange in Issy-les-Moulineaux and is proficient in RIP, OSPF, Cisco Routers, SIP, Certification ITIL v3 Foundations, ToIP, SNMP, HSRP, VRRP.
